summary: Re-textures the Nordic Hunter mod, to a more arctic version. Influenced by Assassins creed 3.
descriptionHtml:
Nex Nordic Hunter


Details: This is a re-texture of the Nordic Hunter mod by frankdema. His was great and all but a snowier version looks great for colder climates. This mod re-textures and adds 2 things. The original mod and (!!! ATTENTION !!!) the Thieves Guild Female armor, This will change it to a white look but I have added more white to the armor of the thieves guild to look natural. Only women have this, not men, or female npc\'s. This re-texture was in theme of Assassins Creed 3.
______________________________________________________________________________________

Composed of
-modded Hunter Armor
-hunter boots
-hunter gloves
-rabbits
-modded Thieves guild armor(needed for modded hunter armor)

______________________________________________________________________________________

Install: Drag and drop the data file from NexNordicHunter.rar to Skyrim location. 

______________________________________________________________________________________
To get the Assassins Creed hood go to this link.
http://www52.zippyshare.com/v/25325067/file.html
______________________________________________________________________________________
Original Nordic Hunter Armor

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xYNB8UEDdNU


______________________________________________________________________________________
Credits: frankdema for allowing me to upload this mod! Great author. You can check his armor here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3805873



Nex- Latin word for snow, you learn something new everyday :)
author: blizzard150
